content.text: Tired of getting poisoned by those pesky Tropical Bees?
Fear that their Silk Wisps have no use?

Well, fear not, because you can turn those Wisps into Woven Silk and turn that into suits! Bee-Suits!The Apiarist's Clothes can be equipped to lessen or even nullify the negative effects of Bees (such as Poison from Tropical Bees).
The more pieces of clothing you wear, the more often will Bees leave you alone.
